headline: Trump drops the f-bomb at the White House. But can you do the same at your job?
summary: Swearing is becoming commonplace in the U.S., but etiquette experts warn of the risks: ‘It could cost you your job.’

headline: Senate version of Trump’s budget bill would raise the debt ceiling by $5 trillion—what it could mean for your wallet
summary: Senate Republicans back a $5 trillion debt ceiling increase — the largest ever — but experts say it’s unlikely to raise borrowing costs in the short term.

headline: How DOGE, Trump, Musk and the ‘big, beautiful’ tax bill are missing the real federal waste
summary: Taxpayers are getting hosed, Social Security and Medicare reports show.
